SEARCH
Module dragonix.fierydragons1
Package dragonix.fierydragons1

Class Player

java.lang.Object
dragonix.fierydragons1.Player
public class Player extends Object
The Player class represents a player in the game, holding information about their position, token, and various game states.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(String playerName, javafx.scene.paint.Color color, Integer currentPosition, javafx.scene.image.ImageView dragonToken, Cave startingCave)
      Constructs a new Player with the specified name, color, position, dragon token, and starting cave.
      Parameters:
      playerName - The name of the player.
      color - The color representing the player in the UI.
      currentPosition - The current position of the player on the game board.
      dragonToken - The graphical representation of the player's token.
      startingCave - The starting cave of the player.
